meanings.definition: To boast or brag more than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She always outbrags her friends about her achievements.
meanings.sent2: He outbrags everyone in the office about his new car.
meanings.sent3: The parrot outbrags the other birds in the park with its loud squawks.
meanings.sent4: The sun outbrags the moon in brightness during the day.
meanings.sent5: The lion outbrags the other animals in the jungle with its mighty roar.

meanings.definition: To surpass in bragging or boasting.
meanings.sent1: The singer outbrags all others with her powerful voice.
meanings.sent2: He outbrags his competitors with his marketing skills.
meanings.sent3: The cat outbrags the dog by always finding the best hiding spots.
meanings.sent4: Her smile outbrags any jewelry she wears.
meanings.sent5: The champion outbrags his opponents with his unbeatable record.
